message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. I'm willing to take a bit more since I'm making the first offer.
Your offer was generous, Alice, but I think a 60-40 split in my favor is more reflective of the decreasing value of the money over time.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to take a smaller share than my initial offer. Let's meet in the middle, 58-42 is a fair split.
